posts.message:
Hello ya Shabab,
I have question here, Is there anybody tried to sell a virtual product online to an Arabic Market? Example: Starter Website or Hosting or even a theme? 
Note: Totally online, marketing, payment, operation and delivery.
Would love to hear your experience in that issue, Thanks a million
Anyone knows a website or a directory of test cases for the most common use cases (e.g. login, share, etc...) ? I am currently looking for test cases that were written for web analytics.

posts.message:
Geeks I want a good tuts or source to know more about Django and answer these questions:
1- What goes to ModelManager and what goes to the Model?
2- Where to put my validation? In Model or in ModelForm? and what about the REST APIs where I can place my validations?
3- Same as 2 but for business logic?

As recommendation and as I found: put your business logic and validation in the Model but is there any full guide or samples?
I'm building an APIs so I won't use Django Views nor Forms and most of TDD tuts are for Views and Forms and tuts or source for that too?

A lot of question but as you get deep into Django will find there are many ways to do things not perfect/one way to do things and this for me is confusing

Off-Topic Question : 
Do any one here know a group about Hardware Study ( eg. Counter, Registers , Decoders , F/F, etc.)

posts.message: Cut off from the Internet, young Cubans have quietly linked thousands of computers into a hidden network that stretches miles across Havana, letting them chat with friends, play games and download hit movies in a mini-replica of the online world that most can't access.
posts.caption: hosted.ap.org
